steps.instruction: Slowly melt the marg then dissolve the sugar and golden syrup.
Once mixed add the oats and Raisins / Nuts
Place evenly in a baking tray with grease proof paper (8x11 pyrex gives 3/4 deep flapjack)
Oven cook for 30 mins in a preheated oven at 160 degress C
Score the flapjack (dont cut) and allow to fully cool, at which point it will break up nicely.
